CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( Career_Development__c <1 , "/img/samples/stars_000.gif", IF(Career_Development__c<2, "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(Career_Development__c<3, "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(Career_Development__c<4, "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(Career_Development__c<5, "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif" ))))), "Rating")
CustomField.label: Career Development Rating
